prompts: Create an adorable Pokemon that can evolve into multiple types depending on its environment.
I want a small, fluffy creature that can blend into its forest surroundings effortlessly.
Generate a Pokémon that has the ability to adapt its abilities based on its surroundings.
Make a charming Pokémon with large ears and a bushy tail, perfect for a starter.
Imagine a playful Pokémon that loves to explore urban areas and make friends.
Design a cute Pokémon that looks like a small fox with a variety of color options.
Show me a Pokémon that can evolve into different forms based on its bond with trainers.
